purposeTemplatesTable.noResultsLabel: The current search returned no results.

defaultPurposeTemplate.description: Describe briefly which data are collected and how
defaultPurposeTemplate.intendedTarget: Describe briefly which entities could benefit from this template

purposeTemplateIntendedTargetField.label: Who is the template you are creating intended for?

radioButton.label: Indicate whether access to the data made available through the use of this E-service is free of charge.

reasonField.label: Justification for free-of-charge access (required)
reasonField.infoLabel: You are required to specify whether the provision of data free of charge is due to a legal exemption/exclusion or other reason. Min 10 characters, max 250 characters.

APICallsField.label: How many API calls per day do you suggest to the user? (optional)

step2.detailsTitle: Suggested e-services for this purpose template
step2.detailsDescription: Are there any e-services or e-service templates that you think this template is particularly suitable for? Select them here. You can also associate e-services after publication.

autocompleteInput.label: E-service or e-service template to associate

step3.detailsDescription: The questionnaire questions will vary based on the answers provided as you go. Changing the answer to a previous question may alter the following questions.
step3.alert: Warning: Do not enter personal data in the free text fields
step3.switchLabel: Assign the completion of this item to the template user

drawer.title: Add annotations
drawer.description: Provide the user with instructions on how to respond to this field. Once the annotation is created, you can attach documents.
drawer.question: Question: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut laboolore magna aliqua.
drawer.label: Annotations

actions.tooltip: You cannot use the template because it is intended for a different type of entity.

tabs.ariaLabel: Three separate tabs for purpose template details, linked e-services, and risk analysis

linkedEservices.title: Linked e-services
linkedEservices.description: The entity has defined a list of e-services for which the facilitated purpose is suggested. The user may also use this template for e-services not included in the list.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: The following guidelines are available for this facilitated risk analysis.

thresholds.title: Suggested load estimate
thresholds.description: The estimated number of API calls per day to the provider's e-service

linkedEservicesTab.title: Linked e-services and template e-services
linkedEservicesTab.description:
Define a list of e-services for which it is suggested to use the facilitated purpose. The user 
  may also use this template for e-services not included in the list.
